conversations.content: I really liked the T-shirt I bought last month. Could you please buy two more for me?

<|Function_Thought|>
I will retrieve the user's order history to locate the T-shirt order from last month. From that order I will extract the order_id and product details to get the invoice or product_id. Next steps will be to get the invoice for that order, find the product_id or exact product name/variant, search the catalog if needed, add two of that product to the cart, then proceed to checkout (asking about discounts if available).
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[view_order_history()]<|/Function_Call|>

{'Order 1': {'order_id': 'ORDER-104674', 'product_name': 'Adidas Mens Z.n.e. T-Shirt', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-04-18', 'delivery_date': '2024-04-20', 'product_id': 'P030'}, 'Order 2': {'order_id': 'ORDER-107495', 'product_name': 'TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-06', 'delivery_date': '2024-05-10', 'product_id': 'P045'}, 'Order 3': {'order_id': 'ORDER-112543', 'product_name': 'Portable SSD 1TB', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-19', 'delivery_date': '2024-05-19', 'product_id': 'P009'}, 'Order 4': {'order_id': 'ORDER-113219', 'product_name': 'SpeedStep Running Shoes', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-19', 'delivery_date': None, 'product_id': 'P023'}}

<|Function_Thought|>
I reviewed the order history and found the T‑shirt purchase: order_id ORDER-104674 (Adidas Mens Z.n.e. T-Shirt, product_id P030, ordered 2024-04-18). Next I need the invoice for ORDER-104674 to confirm the exact product details/variant (size, color, product_id) so I can add the correct item to the cart. I will call get_invoice with that order_id.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[]<|/Function_Call|>
